name: Tankron
description:
Tankron is a top-down wave survival roguelike in which you fight an ever-increasing amount and variety of enemies. Choose from a variety of upgrades to stand a chance. Discover and choose between different tank specializations to enhance your Build.

Features

  • Twin-Stick Shooter or Auto-Shooter
  • 30+ unique Items with interesting synergies
  • Encounter a boss every 5 rounds to test your skills
  • 15 rounds with different enemies
  • 10 different specializations with different playstyles
